item.title: ABRAXAS PETROLEUM CORP 10-K
item.description: ABRAXAS PETROLEUM CORP, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 07, 2021 had 47504 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: oil - 552 instances gas - 544 instances 2020 - 499 instances december - 387 instances 31 - 380 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
